name: 新版透明贴吧样式
description:

最后更新于2014-02-12

discussions.name: 帖子内容页，图片、视频那一行出现竖线，不显示“已关注：取消”框
希望能加宽楼中楼回复
希望能增加隐藏“签名档”的功能。

style_setting_options.label: 加大字体
显示
style_setting_options.value:
.share_thread .bds_more {background: url("http://tb2.bdstatic.com/tb/static-pb/img/pb_css_pic_528226d7.png") repeat scroll -77.5px -179.5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) !important;}
    .share_thread .dis_share_num {background: url("http://tb2.bdstatic.com/tb/static-pb/img/pb_css_pic_528226d7.png") repeat scroll -77.5px -146.5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) !important;}

style_setting_options.label: 透明
style_setting_options.value:
.tb_rich_poster .poster_body .editor_textfield{-moz-appearance: none !important;background: none transparent !important;border:1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)!important;}
.old_style_wrapper,.edui-container .edui-toolbar,.edui-editor-body .edui-body-container{background: none!important;}
